title: GHALCA to expand Top 4 competition to involve Kotoko
text:
Sports News | 1 October 2015 21:55 CET GHALCA to expand Top 4 competition to involve Kotoko - www.ghanasoccernet.com GHALCA chairman Alhaji Ali Raji 
The Ghana League Clubs Association (GHALCA) are considering expanding their annual off-season Top 4 competition to involve teams that finished in the top six of the just ended season. 
This move is to ensure that Asante Kotoko who finished 6 th takes part in the competition.
